meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>One</kanji> <kanji>layer</kanji> more? One whole layer? It must be <vocabulary>much more</vocabulary> important than we thought. Let's pay <vocabulary>all the more</vocabulary> attention, in that case.

This word is often written in kana, but you'll see it in kanji too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. いち goes to いっ.
